short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use to keep track of you viewed videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever got confused trying to figure out your lecture viewing progress?

This extension has the solution!
By adding the "view" icon next to each lecture on the open university website.

How does it work?
Whenever you enter a lecture, the extension will mark that lecture as "viewed" and change its icon.
You can mark and unmark a lecture as viewed by clicking the "view" icon.
By clicking the extension icon at the chrome search tab you can reset the state for the current course.

Enjoy!
